meanings.sent1: Her openhandednesses made her a beloved figure in the community.
meanings.sent2: The openhandednesses of the donors helped many families in need.
meanings.sent3: The openhandednesses of the birthday girl led to a mountain of presents.
meanings.sent4: His openhandednesses were like a river flowing with kindness.
meanings.sent5: The openhandednesses of the charity organization touched many hearts.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being openhanded.
meanings.sent1: The openhandednesses of the boss created a positive work environment.
meanings.sent2: We admire the openhandednesses of our generous neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The openhandednesses of the clown made everyone laugh and smile.
meanings.sent4: In a world of closed fists, his openhandednesses stood out.
meanings.sent5: The openhandednesses of the teacher inspired her students to be kind.
